mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_user WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pw = #{user_pw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone});
mapper.select: SELECT sm.study_cd, s.study_title, s.study_content, s.closed_at, s.study_limit, COALESCE(members.current_members, 0) AS current_members FROM tb_study_member JOIN tb_study s ON sm.study_cd = s.study_cd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT study_cd, COUNT(*) AS current_members FROM tb_study_member WHERE status = 'JOINED' GROUP BY study_cd ) members ON sm.study_cd = members.study_cd WHERE sm.user_id = #{user_id} AND sm.status = 'JOINED' GROUP BY sm.study_cd, s.study_title, s.study_content, s.closed_at, s.study_limit;
SELECT study_cd FROM tb_study_member WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND status = 'JOINED' ORDER BY joined_at DESC LIMIT 1;
